Posts.Content: My aunt recently was diagnosed with stage 4 breast cancer which has traveled to her bones. She has opted for the pill version rather through IV. She has always been one who treasures her appearance and doesn't want to lose her hair. They are going to operate on her breast in a few weeks. I know she is scared but she'd rather go that route and said she'd try the pill first. Is it advisable? She is 53 years old and we don't know how to handle this. Please help..
Posts.Title: Reg chemo Vs Pill

Posts.Content:
New to this forum, but need information about
 ovarian cancer. If anyone has had it, can you please give me the symptons? I was playing paddleball, and suddenly i began having knotting pains in my pelvic area. It felt like my insides were twisting up. Had this pain yesterday at work. Also, my stomach gets bloated.. Please give me you stories. Thank you, Mari...
Posts.Title: NEED HELP

Posts.Content: Ok, just noticed when i cough, feel pressure in my lower butt are..what can this be? Feel a discomfort when i sit.
